technique.name: locked wing
technique.attack: Right arm hammer lock with a left wrist grab

steps.step: Regrab your opponent's right wrist with your right hand, step back toward 6:00 into a forward bow while executing a back elbow to your opponent's solar plexus.
pivot into a neutral bow as you execute a obscure elbow to your opponent's chin.
Execute a outward horizontal palm heel to your opponent's jaw.
Execute a uppercut under your opponent's right elbow.
step toward 3:00 into a forward bow, pivot into a neutral bow bringing your opponent forward and down.
pivot into a forward bow while executing a downward palm heel to the back of your opponent's head.
Execute a vertical to your opponent's face.
